caption.p: (a) Digital elevation model for Satluj River basin in which Nathapa Jhakri and Bhakhara Nangal reservoirs are located. (b–e) Comparison of snow cover obtained using the VIC model (red) with MODIS (blue) for the period of 2004–2007. The figure was developed using the Generic Mapping Tools (GMT) version 5.4.2 ( http://gmt.soest.hawaii.edu).
